# Thumb Rests

Using a thumb rest improves your grip and prevents unintended operation of the camera controls.

The TR-XE4 thumb rest attaches to the hot shoe.

!Thumb Rest Attachment

Slide the grip all the way into the hot shoe and confirm that there are no gaps.

!No Gap !Gap

If the thumb rest connection seems loose, attach the supplied sheet (â‘ ) as shown.

!Supplied Sheet Attachment
